name: Voyage Spacera
description:
This is my 2D Platformer game, collect the keys and make your way through the levels to complete the game. 

I have added the following modifications -

  • Create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  • Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.
  • Modify the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way.

(Note - The WebGl upload of the game wont work properly and i am not sure how to fix it, everytime i do so in unity once i upload the new build it shows me the same issues so please dont dock me any marks. The Windows and Mac builds work fine.)

Credits -

Jessamyn Walsh
